name: Cancel Transfer
description: Cancel transfer notification when a previously sent A02 (transfer patient) event needs to be cancelled
businessPurpose: Cancel a previous patient transfer event due to erroneous entry or decision to reverse the transfer
timing: Sent immediately after determining that a previous A02 transfer event should be cancelled
realWorldScenarios: Transfer cancelled due to receiving unit capacity issues
Physician decision to maintain current location

generationRules.PV1.6: Previous location (that transfer would have moved from)
generationRules.originalTrigger: References original A02 that is being cancelled
generationRules.requiredDataQuality: High - location accuracy critical for patient safety and workflow
